short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tally is a browser extension that transforms the data advertisers collect into a multiplayer game.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tally is a browser extension that transforms data advertisers collect into a multiplayer game. Once installed, a friendly pink blob named Tally lives in the corner of your screen and warns you when companies translate your human experiences into free behavioral data. When Tally encounters “product monsters” (online trackers and their corresponding product marketing categories) you can capture them in a turn-based battle (e.g. “Pokémon style”) transforming the game into a progressive tracker blocker, where you earn the right to be let alone through this playful experience.
